**StratoBayes (pre-formation university spinout)**  
_Last updated: 29 October 2025_

## 1. Who we are
StratoBayes is a university research spinout in pre-formation, developing software for stratigraphic correlation and age modelling. Until formal incorporation, data is administered by the founding research team.

**Contact:** contact@stratobayes.com

## 2. What personal data we collect
When you request a StratoBayes install command or updates, we collect:

- **Email address** — to send your personalized install command and (if you choose) occasional product updates.  
- **Intended use** (Academic / Commercial / Other) — to understand our user base.  
- **Optional notes** you provide — to understand your context.  
- **Consent preference** (updates yes/no) — to respect your choice.

We do not use tracking cookies or collect analytics for marketing.

## 3. How we use your data
1. Email your **personalized install command**.  
2. If you **opt in**, send occasional updates and follow-ups.  
3. High-level, anonymous product planning (e.g., counts of academic vs commercial interest, counts of operating system).

We do **not** sell or share your data with third parties.

## 4. Where your data is stored
Your data is stored in **Cloudflare KV** (UK/EU processing where available) and accessed only by the StratoBayes founders for operations.

## 5. Legal basis for processing
- **Install email:** Consent (you request it).  
- **Optional updates:** Consent (only if you opt in).  
You can withdraw consent at any time.

## 6. How long we keep your data
Registration data is kept for up to 24 months from your last interaction, unless
you request deletion sooner. We reserve the right to keep anonymous, aggregated 
data for product planning beyond that period. 

## 7. Your rights
You may request access, correction, deletion, or withdraw consent at any time.  
Contact: **contact@stratobayes.com**. We aim to respond within **30 days**.

## 8. Unsubscribing
Every update email includes an **unsubscribe** link, or you can email **contact@stratobayes.com** at any time.

We will process unsubscribe requests within **30 days**. You may receive emails already in transit during this time, but no new update messages will be sent after processing is complete.
